items.title: Phaeria's Mine
items.description:
"Tavern" Defense game that focus on resource management and macro strategy.

This is my entry for Ludumdare 40. The theme of the jam was: The more you have, the worse it is.

items.title: Nest Floormap
items.description: Floormap of Nest Co-working space. Display real time information for navigation, room usage & events.

items.title: TechKids - Coding School
items.description:
Original design & code scaffolding of the main site for TechKids Coding School - where I'm serving as an instructor.

Actual website was completed and maintained by the school's graduates.

items.title: House by the bay
items.description: Interactive archviz demo, user can walk around & change interior of the room.

items.title: Johi Farm
items.description:
Kid-friendly action platformer.

This is my entry for Ludumdare 38. The theme of the jam was: Small Worlds.

items.title: g0t Stats?
items.description: Analytic tool for Online Go Server. Provides interesting (I hope) statistics about a player on OGS.

items.title: Apples of Eden
items.description:
A tribute to the mobile classic Snake.

An action puzzle game where you guide Little Snake around the ever-changing garden maze of Eden.

Featuring an innovative gameplay for classic concept.

items.title: Game jam projects
items.description: Personal games I made. Mostly during weeken game jams.
